context_bundle.summary: Context loss recovery procedures. Claude Desktop bug causes random state loss. Use PhiSHRI tools to recover instead of asking user or recreating.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. STOP asking user for state. 2. phishri_get_bootstrap for last known state. 3. Check checkpoints: ls ~/.phishri/sessions/*/checkpoints/. 4. conversation_search for relevant past work. 5. git log on key repos. 6. THEN resume. NEVER recreate without checking first.
common_patterns: git log to verify commits exist
known_errors: Claude Desktop randomly loses context mid-session
Recreating instead of checking = wasted effort
Asking user 'where are we' = admitting failure to checkpoint
